column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I apologize that you found the Spicy Tofu to be overly salty. Of the ingredients in the Spicy Tofu
column2: it is the chili oil that is most salty
column3: so it's surprising that even after the chef added much less chili oil to the second preparation
column4: you still found it too salty. And we served dozens of Salmon Cilantro Sashimi dishes today
column5: and no other customers cited any difference in taste of the ponzu sauce (citrus soy sauce). I can assure you that our recipe has not changed
column7: I'm not sure how or why the dish might taste different.
